name: basic_job_search
description: Search for jobs posted on job sites across the web.

page.description: Page to return (each page includes up to 10 results).

num_pages.description: Number of pages to return, starting from page.

date_posted.description: Find jobs posted within the time you specify.

remote_jobs_only.description: Find remote jobs only (work from home).

employment_types.description: Find jobs of particular employment types.

job_titles.description: Find jobs with specific job titles.

company_types.description: Find jobs posted by companies of certain types.

employer.description: Find jobs posted by specific employers.

radius.description: Return jobs within a certain distance from location as specified as part of the query (in km).

api_key.description: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: search_jobs_with_filters
description: Search for jobs using the JSearch API.

query.description: The job search query. Query examples, web development in chicago, marketing manager in new york via linkedin, developer in germany 60306

page.description: The page to return. Defaults to 1.

num_pages.description: The number of pages to return. Defaults to 1.

date_posted.description: Find jobs posted within the time you specify. Possible values: all, today, 3days, week, month. Default: all.

remote_jobs_only.description: Find remote jobs only. Defaults to False.

employment_types.description: Find jobs of particular employment types.

job_titles.description: Find jobs with specific job titles.

company_types.description: Find jobs posted by companies of certain types.

employer.description: Find jobs posted by specific employers.

radius.description: Return jobs within a certain distance from location.

api_key.description: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: get_job_details
description: Get all job details, including additional application options / links, employer reviews and estimated salaries for similar jobs.

job_ids.description: Job Id of the job for which to get details. You can get the job_ids from 'basic_job_search' function. Batching of up to 20 Job Ids is supported by separating multiple Job Ids by comma (,). Note that each Job Id in a batch request is counted as a request for quota calculation.

extended_publisher_details.description: Return additional publisher details such as website url and favicon.

api_key.description: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: get_salary_estimation
description: Get estimated salaries for a jobs around a location.

job_title.description: Job title for which to get salary estimation.

location.description: Location in which to get salary estimation.

radius.description: Search radius in km (measured from location).

api_key.description: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
